pygtrie
=======

.. automodule:: pygtrie

Installation
------------

To install pygtrie, simply run::

    pip install pygtrie

or by adding line such as::

    pygtrie == 2.*

to projectâ€™s `requirements file
<https://pip.pypa.io/en/latest/user_guide/#requirements-files>`_.
